item.title: [afr] Wight
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Soldier

Wight enters the battlefield tapped.

Life Drain — Whenever a creature dealt damage by Wight this turn dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token and exile that card.

item.title: [afr] Baleful Beholder
item.description:
Creature — Beholder

When Baleful Beholder enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Antimagic Cone — Each opponent sacrifices an enchantment.

• Fear Ray — Creatures you control gain menace until end of turn. (A creature with menance can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

https://mashable.com/article/magic-gathering-dungeons-dragons-adventures?GnilAeTspoTs

Trample

item.title: [afr] "Oswald Fiddlebender"
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Gnome Artificer

item.title: [afr] Den of the Bugbear
item.description:
Land

If you control two or more other lands, Den of the Bugbear enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {R}.

{3}{R}: Until end of turn, Den of the Bugbear becomes a 3/2 red Goblin creature with "Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token that's tapped and attacking." It's still a land.

https://articles.starcitygames.com/news/den-of-the-bugbear-gives-red-new-creature-land-from-adventures-in-the-forgotten-realms/

item.description:

Flying, vigilance

When Icingdeath, Frost Tyrant dies, create Icingdeath, Frost Tongue, a legendary white Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +2/+0", "Whenever equipped creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls," and equip {2}.

item.title: [afr] Flameskull
item.description:
Creature — Skeleton

Flying

Flameskull can't block.

Rejuvenation — When Flameskull dies, exile it. If you do, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards. (If you cast Flameskull this way, you can't play the other card, and vice versa.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0jdOeipKgo

item.title: [afr] The Blackstaff of Waterdeep
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

You many choose not to untap The Blackstaff of Waterdeep during your untap step.

Animate Walking Statue — {1}{U}, {T}: Another target artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature for as long as The Blackstaff of Waterdeep remains tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/blackstaff-waterdeep-2021-06-29/

item.title: [afr] Treasure Chest
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, Sacrifice Treasure Chest: Roll a d20.

1 | Trapped! — You lose 3 life.

2-9 | Create five Treasure tokens.

10-19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.

20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/adventures-forgotten-realms-product-overview-2021-06-29

item.description:
Instant

• Distract the Guard — Tap target creature.

• Hide — Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.description:
Artifact

Climb Over — {T}: Target Wall can't block this turn.

Tie Up — {3}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

item.title: [afr] Orb of Dragonkind
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or to activate abilities of Dragons.

{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orb of Dragonkind: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal a Dragon card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/DeborahAnnWoll/status/1409928113455128582

item.description:
Creature — Human Werewolf

Pack tactics — Whenever Werewolf Pack Leader attacks, if you attacked with creatures with total power 6 or greater this combat, draw a card.

{3}{G}: Until end of turn, Werewolf Pack Leader has base power and toughness 5/3, gains trample, and isn't a Human.

item.title: [afr] The Book of Vile Darkness
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

At the beginning of your end step, if you lost 2 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

{T}, Exile The Book of Vile Darkness and artifacts you control named Eye of Vecna and Hand of Vecna: Create Vecna, a legendary 8/8 black Zombie God creature token with indestructible. It gains all triggered abilities of the exiled cards.

https://twitter.com/Xolo_Mariduena/status/1409930997739646979
